name: Arco Viaggio
hero_image_alt: Arco Viaggio portable manual lever espresso maker in forest green aluminium, held in one hand against a blurred mountain landscape background, a small espresso cup below it catching dark crema-topped espresso, warm golden-hour light, travel backpack out of focus in the background
headline: 340 grams. Genuine espresso. Anywhere.
subheadline: A manual lever espresso maker machined from a single block of aluminium — no electricity, no compromise, no reason to drink bad coffee on the road.
description_short: A portable 340g manual lever espresso maker machined from aluminium — no electricity needed, genuine espresso anywhere.
description_long: The Arco Viaggio weighs less than a paperback and produces espresso that rivals machines fifty times its size. The precision-machined aluminium body and stainless steel filter basket create up to 9 bars of pressure through a simple lever mechanism — your arm is the pump. Add hot water, insert your coffee, press, and in under a minute you have a real shot. The Viaggio disassembles for easy cleaning and packs into the included neoprene travel case. From mountain huts to hotel rooms to train journeys, this is espresso without boundaries.

key_specs.material: CNC-machined 6061 aluminium body, stainless steel filter

use_case_headline: Perfect for travellers, hikers, and anyone who refuses bad coffee.
use_case_body: The Viaggio goes where plug-in machines cannot. Pack it for a weekend in the mountains, a work trip, or a camping expedition — anywhere you have access to hot water and ground coffee, you have espresso.

pairing_products.rationale: Grind fresh beans at home and bring your dose — or use the Macinino as your daily grinder when you're not travelling.
A compact travel scale ensures consistent dosing wherever you are.
